SELECT v.MONTH as month, ifnull( b.count, 0 ) AS minute FROM past_12_month_view v LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( t.playtime, '%Y-%m' ) MONTH, sum( t.onlinetime) AS count FROM knowonline t WHERE DATE_FORMAT( t.playtime, '%Y-%m' ) > DATE_FORMAT( date_sub( curdate( ), INTERVAL 12 MONTH ), '%Y-%m' ) GROUP BY MONTH ) b ON v.MONTH = b.MONTH GROUP BY v.MONTH
